helper_looktwice.FR: Ne jugez rien au premier regard
helper_looktwice.EN: Don't judge anything you see at first sight

helper_greenside.FR: Le sage montre la lune, l'idiot regarde le doigt
helper_greenside.EN: When the wise man points at the moon, the fool looks at the finger

helper_redside.FR: Garder votre objectif en vue et vous l'atteindrez
helper_redside.EN: By watching where you want to go, you should end up reaching your goal
